text: A solatium of Rs. 5 lakh from Chief Minister’s Relief Fund was extended to the family of Irudhaya Joseph Reddiyar, a farmer of Kovilpatti, who died while being involved in a protest demonstration on March 29 in 1993. According to a statement on Thursday, Collector M. Ravikumar extended the relief to the family in the presence of C. Raju, Kovilpatti MLA.
title: Solatium given
